summary: This document is a trading authorization form from Deutsche Bank, allowing an agent to buy, sell, and trade securities on behalf of the undersigned. It outlines the responsibilities and liabilities of both the undersigned and Deutsche Bank in relation to the trading activities conducted under this authorization.
keyFacts: The document is a trading authorization limited to purchases and sales of securities.
It allows an agent to act on behalf of the undersigned in trading activities.
The undersigned agrees to indemnify Deutsche Bank for any losses arising from these transactions.
The authorization is a continuing one until revoked by the undersigned.
The document mentions that Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. is a part of Deutsche Bank AG, which conducts securities activities in the United States.
